Class NetMgr

extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class to manage all Connection instances

      • sendAndWait

        public Xdr sendAndWait(java.lang.String serverIP,
                       int port,
                       boolean usePrivilegedPort,
                       Xdr xdrRequest,
                       int timeout)
                throws RpcException
        Basic RPC call functionality only. Send the request, creating a new connection as necessary, and return the raw Xdr returned.
        Parameters:
        serverIP - The endpoint of the server being called.
        port - The remote host port being called for this operation.
        usePrivilegedPort -
        • If true, use a privileged local port (below 1024) for RPC communication.
        • If false, use any non-privileged local port for RPC communication.
        xdrRequest - The Xdr data for the request.
        timeout - The timeout in seconds.
        Returns:
        The Xdr data for the response.
        Throws:
        RpcException

      • dropConnection

        Parameters:
        key - The key
